headline: A Look At TJX Companies (TJX) Valuation As Positive Wall Street Ratings Highlight Off Price Resilience
summary: TJX Companies (TJX) is back in focus after a fresh wave of upbeat Wall Street commentary, ongoing regional store expansion, and strong signals from institutional and AI driven trading models around the stock. See our latest analysis for TJX Companies. TJX shares recently touched a record high and now trade at US$157.81, with a 90 day share price return of 12.42% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 33.07%. This suggests momentum has been building as store openings and off price resilience...
